extension.summary: A guard that collects informations about running remote instances of Kodi
extension.description: Collect and display informations about your running instances of Kodi in your household. See what your children do with their kodi devices. Power their devices down or send individual messages to your clients.
extension.disclaimer: Use at your own risk. Inform your clients about control them.
